name: Core API Release 36.0.0
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs. This core API release brings you with a few new features and a bug fix.

ADDED.text: Introduced a new feature called Voice over OTP, which will send voice OTPs.
Implemented a new feature called TOKEN_AS_JWT. Enabling this feature will replace the existing access token with a JWT token.
Introducing the new Multipurpose Email/OTP Token Generation API that enables diverse token and OTP generation for email verification, password recovery, one-touch login, and more.

FIXED.text: The issue of the Account APIs not utilizing the Admin Console setting has been resolved.

IMPROVED.text: The security update of using an invalid refresh token multiple times, resulting in the invalidation of other active refresh tokens, has been rolled back.
